Header: Newly-Appointed Air Mobile Brigade Commander Assumes Office
Content: Colonel D. N. J Fernando of the Commando Regiment (CR) assumed duties on Friday (12) as the 20th Commander of the Air Mobile Brigade in Embilipitiya amid military formalities and religious observances. After presenting a Guard Turn Out, the newly-appointed Brigade commander was welcomed to the Brigade Headquarters. He afterwards signed an official document amid religious observances and symbolized the assumption of office. Similarly, a troop address, planting of a sapling and an all rank tea arrangement marked the occasion. Commanding Officers of the 12 Sri Lanka Singha Regiment, 1 Gemunu Watch, 5 Gemunu Watch, Chief Instructor Air Mobile Training School and other Brigade staff officers were present at the occasion.
